results.title: You don't belong here [game trailer]
results.brief_description:
By staying true to your own ideals you will find a group of unique individuals where everyone belongs. A man is shipwrecked on a distant island. He must search the island for a tribe to live in by avoiding obstacles and collecting gems along the way. These tribes will take you in but on the condition you behave like them. You decline their offer saying you have a right to be yourself. You are then banished and must avoid members of these tribes as you continue your search. They attempt to catch you as you dont belong. Finally you come across a tribe that accepts you for who you are. They are all individuals and make you feel like you belong.

Under the category ‘Primary Videogames’, Liam Blake, Hope Valley, SA, was the Screen It 2012 winner.

results.title: Here to Fall
results.creator_credit: Jim Agnew, Kris Kelly, Evelyn McGrath, Blacknorth, Arts Council (Ireland) and Irish Film Board
results.brief_description: A girl falls through darkness. A signal is broadcast, it’s a call. City wires connect and vibrate. The digital signal holds her, dropping her to a city’s rooftops that builds around her. She recognises it, and she’s safe, but for how long?
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jim Agnew, Kris Kelly, Evelyn McGrath, Blacknorth, Arts Council (Ireland) and Irish Film Board

results.title: The Mansion [game trailer]
results.brief_description: It’s a moonless night… Let’s go explore a mansion. In ‘The Mansion’, a nameless character finds himself with the task of searching an old mansion. Although he can’t understand the lost children it doesn’t take a true connection to know only he can help. The story is told through a platformer format, inspired by games such as Super Mario Bros.

results.title: Voyager [game trailer]
results.brief_description: In a faraway world lived two clans, Dezminus and Akai. Their only connection was a trade route, trading Dezminus’ ores for Akai’s wheat. But one day Dezminus’s food supplies stopped coming. So Dezminus decided to declare war and conquer the Clan of Akai. So they sent a warship to declare war on Akai. The captain of that vessel was…you.
